name: Brawl
display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

name: Incendiary_Grenade
display_help: You are taking additional Damage over Time from the fire of the Incendiary Grenade.

name: Throwing_Knives
display_help: With your natural origin you have to rely on your cunning and skill. You've acquired these throwing knives as part of your personal arsenal. You can throw these knives at a very short range, and deal minor Lethal damage to your target, but a nasty wound will do additional Damage over Time. Damage: Minor (DoT), Recharge: Fast

name: Punch
display_help: A decent punch that has a small chance to Disorient foes.

name: Kick
display_help: A modest kicking attack that has a small chance to knock opponents down.

name: Demoralized
display_help: Still demoralized, Ajax hits like a kitten with a head cold.

name: Resistance
display_help: You are naturally resistant to smashing and lethal damage.

name: Power_Blast
display_help: You launch a more powerful blast of energy at a single foe, causing energy and smashing damage. There is a chance that the target will also be knocked back.
display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

name: Power_Bolt
display_help: You rapidly hurl a bolt of energy at a single foe, causing energy and smashing damage. There is a chance that the target will also be knocked down.
display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

name: Power_Burst
display_help: You launch a very powerful burst of energy at a single foe, causing energy and smashing damage. There is a chance that the target will also be knocked back.
display_short_help: Ranged (Close), High DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

name: Explosive_Blast
display_help: You hurl a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, causing all foes in caught in the blast to suffer energy and smashing damage. There is also a chance that affected foes will be knocked back.
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

name: Cybernetic_Blade
display_help: You slash your target with a cybernetic arm, causing lethal damage.

name: Energy_Torrent
display_help: You unleash a powerful cone of energy in the direction of an enemy target. This energy blast causes smashing and energy damage to affected targets. There is also a chance for affected targets to be knocked back.
display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Superior DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

name: Bone_Smasher
display_help: You crush a single target with an energy infused overhead punch, causing smashing and energy damage. There is also a chance your target may be stunned.
display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG (Smashing/Energy), Chance for Stun (Foe)

name: Total_Focus
display_help: You strike a single target with an exceptionally powerful burst of energy. This causes the target and all those nearby to suffer smashing and energy damage. Affected targets are also stunned and may be taunted, preventing them from taking action against anyone but you.
display_short_help: Melee (Targeted AoE), Extreme DMG(Energy/Smashing), Stun (Foe), Chance to Taunt (Foe)

name: Spectral_Wounds
display_help: The target is made to believe that they are suffering from real, bleeding wounds, but the effects are initially only in their mind. Only at the end are the wounds made real in a burst of lethal damage.

name: Telekinetic_Blast
display_help: You fire a burst of energy from your mind with such force that it can knock enemies back.

name: Psionic_Dart
display_help: This basic attack does minor Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed, but has a very fast attack rate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Mind_Probe
display_help: Grip the minds of your foe with a Mind Probe. You must be in close proximity to pull off this attack that wrecks havoc on your foes synapses, dealing moderate Psionic Damage while reducing their attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Psionic_Lightning
display_help: You cause a bolt of psionic energy to strike your foe, dealing heavy damage. These bolts also have a chance to drain the enemy's endurance.

name: Drain_Psyche
display_help: You Drain the Psyche of you nearby foes, thus weakening their Hit Point Regeneration and Endurance Recovery and boosting your own. Recharge: Very Long

name: Ring_of_Fire
display_help: You immobilize your foe in a ring of fire, causing fire damage over time. Affected targets cannot move and are unable to fly. Recharge: Fast

name: Char
display_help: You surround your target with charred soot and ash, choking them. This momentarily incapacitates them, holding them in place. The target also suffers fire damage over time due to the smoldering debris. Recharge: Moderate

name: Cinders
display_help: You create a whirling field of cinders around yourself, causing nearby targets to choke. This causes all affected targets to become incapacitated and held in place. Recharge: Slow

name: Bonfire
display_help: You can create a bonfire at the feet of a distant target. This causes any foes who try to pass through it to suffer fire damage and be knocked back. Recharge: Slow

name: Fire_Imps
display_help: You create 3 small Imps out of pure flame. Fire Imps will viciously attack any nearby foes, but they only possess the most basic instincts and cannot be controlled. Recharge: Slow

name: Power_Bolt
display_help: You rapidly hurl a bolt of energy at a single foe, causing energy and smashing damage. There is a chance that the target will also be knocked down. Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

name: Power_Blast
display_help: You launch a more powerful blast of energy at a single foe, causing energy and smashing damage. There is a chance that the target will also be knocked back. Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

name: Power_Burst
display_help: You launch a very powerful burst of energy at a single foe, causing energy and smashing damage. There is a chance that the target will also be knocked back. Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Ranged (Close), Extreme DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

name: Assault_Strike
display_help: You deliver a pair of lightning fast blows to your opponent in an effort to throw them off balance, causing smashing damage. This attack can also bruise your target, reducing their defenses.

name: Heavy_Blow
display_help: You strike your target with a powerful punch, causing smashing damage. This punch is powerful enough that it can knock a target down.
display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smashing), Chance for Knockdown(Foe)

name: Throwing_Knives
display_help: You throw a sharpened dagger at your target.

name: Agile_Cross
display_help: You execute a sweeping right hook that can strike multiple targets in your frontal arc. This attack will cause smashing damage. The force of the attack causes trauma, which causes minor lethal damage and reduced regeneration and recovery rates.
display_short_help: Melee (Cone), High DMG (Smashing), Minor DoT (Lethal), Chance for -Regen(Foe), -Rec(Foe)

name: Concussive_Blow
display_help: You strike the ground with tremendous force, causing a shockwave of energy that blasts foes around you. All targets nearby suffer smashing damage and minor lethal damage, and may also be knocked back. Additionally, some targets will suffer a minor concussion from the attack, reducing their chance to hit, attack speed and damage.
display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Smashing), Minor DoT(Lethal), Chance for Stun(Foe), -ToHit(Foe), -Rech(Foe), -DMG(Foe,All)

name: Fearsome_Blow
display_help: You strike your target with a spinning attack that lands two blows in quick succession. The blows cause smashing damage and are forceful enough to occasionally knock your target down. Additionally, there is a chance that the attack may cause your target to be afraid.
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG (Smashing), Chance for Knockdown(Foe), Fear(Foe)

name: Rallying_Cry
display_help: You strike the ground with tremendous force, causing a shockwave of energy that blasts foes around you. All targets nearby suffer smashing damage and minor lethal damage, and may also be knocked back. Additionally, some targets will suffer a minor concussion from the attack, reducing their chance to hit, attack speed and damage.
display_short_help: PBAoE, Buff(Self and Allies), +DMG(All), +ToHit, +RES(All Status Effects), +Prot(All Status Effects)

name: Shattering_Uppercut
display_help: You strike your target with a powerful uppercut that knocks them into the air. The force of the blow hits for smashing damage and causes trauma for additional lethal damage. The affected target is unable to fly for a short period and suffers reduced defenses. Finally, the target may be confused or stunned after recovering from being knocked into the air.
display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Smashing), Knockup(Foe), -Fly(Foe), -DEF(All,Foe), Chance for Confuse OR Stun(Foe)

name: Corruption
display_help: You lash our with your whip firing a bolt of hellfire from its tip corrupting your victim's very living essence dealing minor fire damage, minor toxic damage over time as well as reducing their damage resistance for a short time. Damage: Minor Recharge: Very Fast
display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG(Fire), Foe Minor DoT (Toxic), -Res

name: Summon_Demonlings
display_help: Call forth up to three demonlings (depending on your level) to do your bidding. The first demonling is adept at manipulating fire, the second blasts your foes with cold attacks and the third is able to wield hellfire to deal fire/toxic damage. You may only have three demonlings under your command at any given time. If you attempt to summon more demonlings, you can only replace those that have been lost in battle. If you already have your maximum allowed amount, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

name: Lash
display_help: You channel unholy energies into your whip and Lash out at your foe dealing high fire damage causing toxic damage over time. Lash has longer range than most melee attacks will reduce the target's damage resistance and also has a chance to knockdown your target. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
display_short_help: Close, High DMG(Fire), Foe -Res, Knockdown, Minor DoT(Toxic)

name: Crack_Whip
display_help: You channel hellfire into your whip and make an impressive sweep causing high fire damage to enemies within a wide cone and also cause some toxic damage over time. Whip Crack has a larger range than most melee cones. Targets that are struck will also have their resistance to damage reduced for a short time, may suffer toxic damage over time and may be knocked down. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Short Ranged (Cone), High DMG(Fire), Foe -Res, Knockdown, DoT(Toxic)

name: Summon_Demons
display_help: Summons forth one to two Demons (depending on your level) to do your bidding. The first demon summoned is cloaked in hellfire and has skin as hard as stone while the second demon manipulates flame. You may only have 2 Demons under your control at any given time. If you attempt to call more Demons, you can only replace the ones you have lost in battle. If you already have your maximum allowed number, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

name: Summon_Demon_Prince
display_help: Summons forth a foul Demon Prince from the deepest reaches of the Abyss. The Demon Prince is mighty among its kind and is a master of cold powers. It serves the conjuror only so that it may wreak havoc upon the material plane. The Demon has some defense versus lethal, smashing, fire and cold attacks. You may only have 1 Demon Prince under your control at any given time. If you attempt to summon another Demon Prince the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

name: Twilight_Grasp
display_help: You channel Negative Energy from the Netherworld through yourself to a targeted foe. Twilight Grasp drains the power from that target and slowly transfers it to you and all nearby allies. The targeted foe's chance to hit and damage are reduced, while you and your nearby allies are healed. Recharge: Moderate

name: Tar_Patch
display_help: Drops a large patch of viscous Negative Energy which dramatically slows down enemies that run through it and reduces their damage resistance. Affected targets stuck in the Tar Patch cannot jump or fly. Recharge: Slow

name: Darkest_Night
display_help: While active, you channel Negative Energy onto a targeted foe. Darkest Night decreases the damage potential and chance to hit of the target, and all foes nearby, as long as you keep the power active. Recharge: Moderate

name: Corruption
display_help: You lash our with your whip firing a bolt of hellfire from its tip corrupting your victim's very living essence dealing minor fire damage, minor toxic damage over time as well as reducing their damage resistance for a short time. Damage: Minor Recharge: Very Fast
display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG(Fire), Foe Minor DoT (Toxic), -Res

name: Lash
display_help: You channel unholy energies into your whip and Lash out at your foe dealing high fire damage causing toxic damage over time. Lash has longer range than most melee attacks will reduce the target's damage resistance and also has a chance to knockdown your target. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
display_short_help: Close, High DMG(Fire), Foe -Res, Knockdown, Minor DoT(Toxic)

name: Crack_Whip
display_help: You channel hellfire into your whip and make an impressive sweep causing high fire damage to enemies within a wide cone and also cause some toxic damage over time. Whip Crack has a larger range than most melee cones. Targets that are struck will also have their resistance to damage reduced for a short time, may suffer toxic damage over time and may be knocked down. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Short Ranged (Cone), High DMG(Fire), Foe -Res, Knockdown, DoT(Toxic)

name: Tar_Patch
display_help: Drops a large patch of viscous Negative Energy which dramatically slows down enemies that run through it and reduces their damage resistance. Affected targets stuck in the Tar Patch cannot jump or fly. Recharge: Slow

name: Darkest_Night
display_help: While active, you channel Negative Energy onto a targeted foe. Darkest Night decreases the damage potential and chance to hit of the target, and all foes nearby, as long as you keep the power active. Recharge: Moderate

name: Speed_Boost
display_help: Script

name: Threatening_Aura
display_help: Desdemona's power and command over demons is threatening to the Praetorian forces who are not used to seeing magic wielded so effectively. She is deemed a very significant threat and will be handled as such.

name: Ember_Shield
display_help: Desdemona is defending you from Explosive Charges with her Ember Shield.

name: Summon_the_Horde
display_help: Desdemona can call forth a horde of Demons with a single summoning.

name: Mark_of_Leadership
display_help: You are being led by someone.

name: Untouchable
display_help: You are untouchable.

name: Intangible
display_help: Special

name: Electric_Fence
display_help: You surround a single target in an electrical fence, immobilizing them. The target suffers energy damage over time, loses endurance and endures a lowered recovery rate. Some of the drained endurance may be returned to you.
display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DoT (Energy), Immobilize (Foe), EndDrain (Foe), -Rec (Foe), -Fly (Foe), Chance for EndGain (Self)

name: Tesla_Cage
display_help: You confine your target in an electrical prison, holding them in place. The target suffers energy damage, endurance loss and lowered recovery rate. Some of the drained endurance may be returned to you.
display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG (Energy), Hold (Foe), EndDrain (Foe), -Rec (Foe), Chance for EndGain (Self)

name: Chain_Fences
display_help: You immobilize multiple foes in a chain of electricity, dealing minor energy damage and draining the endurance of affected foes. These foes also suffer from reduced recovery rates.
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DMG (Energy), Immobilize (Foe), EndDrain (Foe), -Rec (Foe), -Fly (Foe)

name: Jolting_Chain
display_help: You send a bolt of electricity through multiple opponents, causing muscle spasms and dealing minor damage. Each affected foe is knocked down, and suffers both endurance loss and lowered recovery. This bolt can fork several times, jumping to several opponents rapidly.
display_short_help: Ranged (Chain AoE), Minor DMG(Energy), Knockdown (Foe), EndDrain (Foe), -Rec (Foe)

name: Charged_Bolts
display_help: You quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes, dealing energy damage and draining some endurance. These bolts may also lower the target's recovery rate. Some of this endurance may transfer back to you.
display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Energy), EndDrain (Foe), Chance for -Rec (Foe), EndGain (Self)

name: Charged_Brawl
display_help: Your fists become electrically charged and deliver a powerful punch to a single target. This causes energy damage and drains endurance. There is a chance that the target will suffer reduced recovery rate. Additionally, some of the drained endurance may return to you.
display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG (Smashing/Energy), EndDrain (Foe), Chance for -Rec (Foe), EndGain (Self)

name: Havok_Punch
display_help: Your fists become electrically charged and deliver a powerful punch to a single target. This causes energy damage and drains endurance. There is a chance that the target will suffer reduced recovery rate and be knocked back. Additionally, some of the drained endurance may return to you.
display_short_help: Melee, High DMG (Smashing/Energy), EndDrain (Foe), Chance for -Rec (Foe), Knockdown (Foe), EndGain (Self)

name: Thunder_Strike
display_help: You discharge a cone of static electricity that deals energy damage and drains endurance from all affected foes. Additionally, affected foes suffer a reduced recovery rate. Some of the drained endurance may be returned to you.
display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG (Energy), EndDrain (Foe), -Rec (Foe), Chance for EndGain (Self)

name: Charge
display_help: You still carry a charge leftover from the Chain Jolt. You may accidentally release this charge and zap a nearby ally.

name: Charge
display_help: You still carry a charge leftover from the Chain Jolt. You may accidentally release this charge and zap a nearby ally.

name: Charge
display_help: You still carry a charge leftover from the Chain Jolt. You may accidentally release this charge and zap a nearby ally.

name: Aqua_Bolt
display_help: You strike your foe with a rapid blast of freezing cold water, causing cold and smashing damage. The target's defenses are also reduced.

name: Hydro_Blast
display_help: You focus your energy and unleash an intense blast of chilling water at your foe, causing cold and smashing damage. Affected foes will also have their movement speed reduced. There is also a chance that the target will be knocked down.
display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Cold/Smashing), -Speed (Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

name: Water_Burst
display_help: You cause water to violently explode from beneath the feet of a single target. The target and all nearby foes are blasted with freezing cold water and suffer cold and smashing damage. Additionally, all affected targets will have their movement speeds reduced and may be knocked down.
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Superior DMG(Cold/Smashing), -Speed (Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

name: Steam_Spray
display_help: You spray scalding hot steam in a cone in front of you, badly burning foes caught within the spray. Affected foes suffer an initial burst of fire damage, as well as fire damage over time, and experience reduced defenses for a short time.
display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Extreme DMG (Fire), Minor DoT (Fire), -DEF (Foe, All)

name: Geyser
display_help: You cause a powerful geyser of scalding hot water to erupt from within the earth, burning your foes and tossing them into the air. Affected targets suffer fire damage and are knocked into the air, while also suffering smashing damage and reduced movement speeds upon falling back to the ground. There is a chance that the fall could also leave affected targets stunned.
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Extreme DMG(Fire/Smashing), -Speed (Foe, All), Knockup (Foe), Chance for Stun (Foe)

name: Transfusion
display_help: You drain an enemy of some endurance and lower their regeneration. The energy drained is transferred to you and your allies, healing them.

name: Siphon_Power
display_help: You manipulate life energy to drain power from a targeted foe, reducing their damage potential. This drained power is transferred back to you, increasing your own damage potential and that of all nearby allies.

name: Fulcrum_Shift
display_help: You drain the power of a targeted foe and all foes near the target, transferring this drained power to yourself and all nearby allies. Affected foes suffer reduced damage potential, while affected allies gain improved damage potential. The amount of the damage potential bonus increases in proportion to the number of targets affected by the power drain.

name: Incinerate
display_help: You are being Incinerated. It burns!

name: Freezing_Touch
display_help: FrostFire has Held you frozen in a block of Ice.

name: Ice_Blast
display_help: FrostFire's Ice Blast has chilled you, slowing your attack and movement speeds.

name: Freeze_Ray
display_help: FrostFire has Held you frozen in a block of Ice.

name: Fire_Ball
display_help: You are on fire!

name: Chilblain
display_help: You are Immobilized and taking cold damage over time.

name: Flashfire
display_help: You are Disoriented and on fire!

name: Blazing_Aura
display_help: You are taking fire damage from FrostFire's Blazing Aura.

name: Chilling_Embrace
display_help: You are slowed from FrostFire's Chilling Embrace.

name: Resistance
display_help: Resistance

name: Power_Bolt
display_help: You rapidly hurl a bolt of energy at a single foe, causing energy and smashing damage. There is a chance that the target will also be knocked down.
display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

name: Energy_Torrent
display_help: You unleash a powerful cone of energy in the direction of an enemy target. This energy blast causes smashing and energy damage to affected targets. There is also a chance for affected targets to be knocked back.
display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Superior DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

name: Force_Bolt
display_help: You discharge a bolt of force that knocks down foes and deals smashing damage.

name: Phantasm
display_help: You can construct a powerful entity composed of pure light. Although made of light, the Phantasm is tangible and has powerful Energy attacks. The Phantasm can also fly and summon duplicates of itself. The duplicates are intangible, and cannot be harmed. The duplicates' attacks deal illusory damage similar to that dealt by Spectral Wounds. Only the original Phantasm can be healed and buffed. Recharge: Very Long

name: Protection_Shield
display_help: You protect an ally from Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks for a limited time, along with reducing Toxic damage.
display_short_help: Ranged, Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Res(Toxic)

name: Detention_Field
display_help: You encase a targeted foe in a detention field. The captured target is held and immobilized.

name: Dispersion_Bubble
display_help: You create a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increased Defense against all attacks except Psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow

name: Repulsion_Bomb
display_help: You project an expanding force bubble around a targeted foe, causing smashing damage to that target and its nearby allies. Additionally, affected targets will be both knocked down and stunned.
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted Ally AoE), Foe Knockback, Disorient

name: Power_Bolt
display_help: A quick attack. Rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down.

name: Energy_Torrent
display_help: You unleash a powerful cone of energy in the direction of an enemy target. This energy blast causes smashing and energy damage to affected targets. There is also a chance for affected targets to be knocked back.
display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Superior DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

name: Resistance
display_help: The Phantasm is resistant to Lethal and Energy damage, but vulnerable to Negative Energy.

name: Fly
display_help: Phantasms can Fly!

name: Brawl
display_help: Imps Brawl with fiery fists.

name: Resist_Fire
display_help: Fire Imps take less damage from Fire attacks, can jump quite high, and can travel quickly.

name: Resistance
display_help: You are naturally resistant to smashing damage.

name: Barrage
display_help: You perform a pair of quick punches that deal smashing and energy damage. There is a small chance your target will be stunned by these blows.
display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Smashing/Energy), Chance for Stun (Foe)

name: Energy_Punch
display_help: You channel energy into your fists, unleashing a powerful blow that strikes the target for smashing and energy damage. There is also a small chance the target will be stunned.
display_short_help: Melee, High DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Stun (Foe)

name: Whirling_Hands
display_help: You unleash a powerful roundhouse punch charged with energy, striking multiple nearby targets for smashing and energy damage. There is also a chance that affected targets around you will be stunned.
display_short_help: PBAoE, Superior DMG (Smashing/Energy), Chance for Stun (Foe)

name: Taunt
display_help: You taunt a targeted foe, potentially drawing the attention of that foe and all those around them. All targets will have their effective range reduced, while some will be able to focus on no other attacker but you.

name: Bone_Smasher
display_help: You charge up your fists with energy and then bring them down on the head of a single target. This causes smashing and energy damage. There is also a high chance that the target is stunned.
display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG (Smashing/Energy), Chance for Stun (Foe)

name: Foot_Stomp
display_help: You stomp your foot with tremendous force, shaking the very earth. All nearby foes suffer smashing damage and may be knocked back.
display_short_help: PBAoE, Superior DMG (Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

name: Cryo_Rifle_MK2
display_help: You are equipped with the latest upgrade of the Crey Industries Cryo Rifle. Like previous models, your target will suffer cold damage and reductions in both movement and attack speeds. However, instead of putting your target to sleep, this rifle will immobilize your target.

name: N2_Discharge
display_help: You release the pressure valves on the liquid nitrogen chambers within your Cryo Rifle, channeling the pressurized liquid nitrogen into a burst that chills multiple targets in an arc in front of you. Affected targets suffer cold damage over time and reductions in both their movement and attack speeds.

name: Nimble_Slash
display_help: A quick swipe with your blades. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. This attack begins both the Empower and Weaken combination attacks. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

name: Power_Slice
display_help: You perform a deadly Strike with your blades. This is a basic attack that deals a moderate amount of lethal damage. This power is needed for the Sweep combination attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Ablating_Strike
display_help: You slash at your foe with your blades, dealing a good amount of lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This power is needed for the Empower and Weaken combination attacks, and is the beginning of the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Throwing_Knives
display_help: You launch a bladed projectile from your armor, causing minor lethal damage to your target. The knife leaves behind a bleeding wound, which causes additional lethal damage over time.

name: Kinetic_Shield
display_help: Kinetic Shield creates a harmonic Energy Aura that can deflect physical attacks. Your Defense to Smashing and Lethal attacks is increased as weapons and powers like bullets, blades and punches tend to deflect off the shield. Kinetic Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs. The Energy based nature of Kinetic Shield also offers some minimal Defense to Energy attacks. Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Smashing, Lethal, Energy), Res(Defense Debuff)

name: Power_Shield
display_help: This Power Shield creates a Electro-Magnetic shield around you that can deflect non-physical attacks. Your Defense to Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy attacks is increased as these attacks are reflected or refracted off the shield. Power Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs. Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Res(Defense Debuff)

name: Chemical_Ammunition
display_help: You've swapped your ammunition and are now equipped with 'Chemical Rounds.' Most of your Dual Pistol attacks will have their secondary damage converted to toxic damage and inflict a minor damage debuff effect on the target.

name: Toxic_Pistol
display_help: Quickly fires a round from one of your heavy automatic pistols. Damage is average, but the fire rate is very fast. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic.

name: Twin_Pistols
display_help: Dual Wield fires both pistols in rapid succession at its desired target. This power is slower than Pistols, but deals more damage, and the target may get knocked down by the force of the impact. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.

name: Empty_Cells
display_help: You empty the clips of both your pistols in an arc of suppression fire. This attack can blast multiple foes in the affected cone area, and has a small chance of knocking some foes down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.

name: Toxic_Rain
display_help: You fire your pistols faster than the human eye can follow, causing your bullet trajectory to arc, dealing moderate Lethal damage and possibly knocking your foes back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.

name: Executioners_Shot
display_help: Executioner's Shot is a deadly close range attack. Foes struck by this attack will suffer lethal damage and will likely be knocked back by the impact of this attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.

name: Piercing_Rounds
display_help: You fire your pistols with deadly precision in a very narrow cone, piercing your enemy. Piercing Rounds deals High lethal damage and reduces targets' Damage Resistance for a short time. Damage: High Recharge: Long NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from a resistance debuff to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.

name: Front_Kick
display_help: You can perform a slow, high damage kick that will likely knock your target back. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Pistol_Whip
display_help: You can perform a devastating kick that can severely Disorient most opponents. Eagle's Claw has an exceptionally good critical hit capability, better than other Martial Arts attacks, that can sometimes deal double damage. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Smash), Foe Minor Disorient, +Special

name: Cloaking_Device_Low
display_help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow

name: Cloaking_Device
display_help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow

name: Chemical_Ammunition
display_help: You've swapped your ammunition and are now equipped with 'Chemical Rounds.' Most of your Dual Pistol attacks will have their secondary damage converted to toxic damage and inflict a minor damage debuff effect on the target.

name: Toxic_Pistol
display_help: Quickly fires a round from one of your heavy automatic pistols. Damage is average, but the fire rate is very fast. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic.

name: Twin_Pistols
display_help: Dual Wield fires both pistols in rapid succession at its desired target. This power is slower than Pistols, but deals more damage, and the target may get knocked down by the force of the impact. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.

name: Empty_Cells
display_help: You empty the clips of both your pistols in an arc of suppression fire. This attack can blast multiple foes in the affected cone area, and has a small chance of knocking some foes down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.

name: Toxic_Rain
display_help: You fire your pistols faster than the human eye can follow, causing your bullet trajectory to arc, dealing moderate Lethal damage and possibly knocking your foes back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.

name: Front_Kick
display_help: You can perform a slow, high damage kick that will likely knock your target back. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Cloaking_Device_Low
display_help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow

name: Resistance
display_help: Rooftop Resistance

name: Slash
display_help: You perform a quick slash that deals lethal damage and can reduce a target's defense.

name: Slice
display_help: You slice your opponent for a high amount of lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's defense.

name: Luddite_Armor
display_help: The Luddites do not go into battle completely unprepared. This armor gives them resistance to smashing and lethal damage.

name: Fire_Blast
display_help: You unleash a blast of fire at your target, causing fire damage and setting them ablaze.

name: Flash_Stomp
display_help: You stomp the ground around your targets, knocking some back while causing fire damage to all those affected and setting them ablaze.
display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Fire), Minor DoT(Fire), Knockback(Foe)

name: Fire_Breath
display_help: You breath fire on your targets, causing fire damage while setting them ablaze.

name: Single_Shot
display_help: You fire a single blast from your Beam Rifle, causing energy damage and lowering your target's regeneration. The target will also suffer minor energy damage over time. There is also a chance the target may be knocked down.
display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG (Energy), Minor DoT (Energy), -Regen (Foe), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

name: Charged_Shot
display_help: You charge up your beam rifle to launch a concentrated blast of energy at your foe, causing energy damage and lowering recovery. The target will also suffer minor energy damage over time. There is also a chance that your target will be knocked down by the blast.
display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG (Energy), Minor DoT (Energy), -Rec (Foe), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

name: Cutting_Beam
display_help: You fire a steady beam of energy from your beam rifle, sweeping it in a broad arc across the foes in front of you. This causes energy damage to all affected targets, as well as a reduction in defense. There is also a chance that an affected target will suffer additional energy damage over time due to the lingering effects of the energy beam.

name: Piercing_Beam
display_help: You fire a supercharged beam of energy in a narrow cone that pierces through up to 3 enemies. Affected targets suffer energy damage and reduced resistance to all types of damage. There is a chance that affected targets will also suffer additional energy damage over time due to the lingering effects of the beam.
display_short_help: Ranged (Narrow Cone), Superior DMG (Energy), -RES (Foe, All), Chance for Moderate DoT (Energy)

name: Overcharge
display_help: You overcharge your beam rifle, releasing the energy in a massive beam at a group of distant foes. Affected targets suffer energy damage, with a small amount of lingering energy damage over time, along with reduction in their defense. There is also a high chance that for an affected target to be stunned.
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Extreme DMG(Energy), Minor DoT (Energy), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Stun (Foe)

name: Web_Grenade
display_help: You throw a grenade at a single target. On impact, this grenade expels as a strong, sticky gel that can can immobilize most targets and prevent flight. The target will also suffer reductions in their movement and attack speeds.

name: Smoke_Grenade
display_help: You throw a grenade at a single target. On impact, this grenade expels as a thick smoke that obscures a small area. This reduces the perception and chance to hit for all targets caught within the area of effect.

name: Targeting_Drone
display_help: When this small device is activated, a Targeting Drone will begin to hover around your head and assist your combat performance with laser sights. These sights dramatically improve your chance to hit and increase your perception, allowing you to better see stealthy foes. Targeting Drone also grants you resistance to powers that reduce your perception and chance to hit.

name: Levitate
display_help: You send a single target violently into the air before slamming them to the ground for smashing damage. The target is also rendered unable to fly for a short while.

name: Dominate
display_help: You painfully tear at the mind of a single foe, causing psionic damage and rendering the target helpless, lost in their own mind and unable to defend themselves.

name: Confuse
display_help: You invoke confusion in a single target, causing them to be unable to reliably distinguish friend and foe for a short time.

name: Terrify
display_help: This power Terrifies foes within a cone area in front of you, causing them to tremble in Fear uncontrollably. The affect is so frightening and overwhelming, that the target takes real damage from the physiological response to this Psionic attack. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

name: Psionic_Dart
display_help: You fire a concentrated bolt of psionic energy at your target, causing psionic damage and lowering attack speed.

name: Telekinetic_Thrust
display_help: You unleash a focused attack of intense mental power that violently sends a nearby foe flying. This causes psionic and smashing damage and knocks affected targets back.

name: Mental_Blast
display_help: You fire a concentrated blast of psionic energy at your target, causing psionic damage and lowering attack speed.

name: Subdue
display_help: You mentally manipulate your target's mind, subduing them. This causes psionic damage and may briefly immobilize the target.
display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG (Psionic), Chance for Immobilize (Foe)

name: Dull_Pain
display_help: You activate special programming within your armor that temporarily boosts your maximum hit points.

name: Resistance
display_help: You are resistant to smashing, lethal and cold damage, but are vulnerable to energy damage.

name: Sawblade
display_help: You throw sawblades with great force due to your cybernetic enhancements. This sawblade strikes a distant target, causing an initial burst of lethal damage and lethal damage over time. The target also suffers reduced regeneration and recovery. There is also a small chance the target will be knocked back.
display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG (Lethal), Minor DoT (Lethal), -Regen (Foe), -Rec (Foe), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

name: Cybernetic_Hammers
display_help: You smash a single target with one of your cybernetic hammers. This causes smashing damage and reduces the target's defenses. There is also a chance that the target may be stunned.
display_short_help: Melee, High DMG (Smashing), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Stun (Foe)

name: Hammer_Clap
display_help: You crash both of your cybernetic hammers together with tremendous force, creating a shockwave that causes smashing damage to all foes around you. Affected targets may also be knocked back and stunned.
display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG (Smashing), Chance for Stun (Foe), Knockback (Foe)

name: Tank_Grenade
display_help: You launch a fragmentation grenade at long range from your armor's backpack. This explodes on impact, throwing shrapnel that causes smashing and lethal damage. There is also a high chance that the concussive effect from the explosion will knock affected targets back.
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Superior DMG (Lethal/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

name: Hack
display_help: You perform a tough slashing attack with your blade, causing lethal damage. This attack will also reduce the defenses of your target and has a chance to land a critical strike, causing additional lethal damage. If hidden, this critical strike chance is guaranteed.
display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Lethal), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Critical DMG (Lethal)

name: Slash
display_help: You perform a quick slashing attack with your blade, causing lethal damage. This attack will also reduce the target's defenses and has a small chance for a critical strike, causing additional lethal damage. If hidden, this critical strike chance is guaranteed.
display_short_help: Melee, Minor DMG(Lethal), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Critical DMG (Lethal)

name: Shuriken
display_help: A classic small throwing weapon, you can throw Shurikens at a pretty fast fire rate. You must be level 44 and have Web Grenade or Caltrops before selecting this power. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Assassins_Blade
display_help: You impale your foe on your blade, causing lethal damage. There is a chance that this attack will be a critical hit, causing additional lethal damage. If hidden, this critical strike chance is guaranteed.
display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG (Lethal), Chance for Critical DMG (Lethal)

name: Placate
display_help: You placate a foe, convincing them to break off their attacks on you. If successful, you will also be hidden from your foes. This stealth effect is very brief and offers no defense bonuses, but it will allow you to set up an attack for a critical strike. If you attack a placated foe, the effect will break, allowing the foe to attack you once more.

name: Head_Splitter
display_help: You perform a devastating Golden Dragonfly attack that deals a massive amount of lethal damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce their Defense. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. If executed while hidden, only some affected targets may be hit with a Critical, however, there is a chance you may land a Critical hit with Golden Dragonfly even if you are not Hidden. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG (Lethal), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

name: Hide
display_help: You utilize masterful stealth techniques to become almost impossible to detect. When properly hidden, you can pull off critical hits with your attacks. If you attack or are damaged while hidden, the effect will break and you will be unable to set up guaranteed critical strikes, though you will retain your defense bonuses for a short while.

name: Dark_Regeneration
display_help: You tap the dark essence of the Netherworld to drain a small amount of life through negative energy damage from all enemies nearby, healing yourself in the process. The more foes affected, the more you will be healed.

name: Cloak_of_Fear
display_help: You can wrap yourself in a nightmarish Cloak of Fear. Foes close to you are treated to visions most horrific, forcing them to tremble in terror, only attacking if attacked, and even then, with a reduced chance to hit. Recharge: Fast

name: 12_Gauge
display_help: You fire a shot from your 12 Gauge Shotgun, causing lethal damage to several enemies in a cone in front of you. There is also a chance for affected targets to be knocked down.
display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), High DMG (Lethal), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

name: Slug
display_help: You fire a concentrated slug at a single foe. This causes lethal damage and has a high chance to knock the target down.
display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG(Lethal), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

name: Frag_Grenade
display_help: You throw a fragmentation grenade at a single target. This explodes on impact, throwing shrapnel that causes smashing and lethal damage. There is also a high chance that the concussive effect from the explosion will knock affected targets back.
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Extreme DMG (Smashing/Lethal), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

name: Jab
display_help: You strike your target with a strong jab. The speed of this attack may catch your opponent off guard, momentarily stunning them.
display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG (Smashing), Chance for Stun (Foe)

name: Punch
display_help: You strike your target with a hard punch. Your opponent will suffer smashing damage from the blow and may be knocked back.
display_short_help: Melee, High DMG (Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

name: Haymaker
display_help: You strike your target with a very strong haymaker meant to lay them out. Your opponent will suffer smashing damage from the blow and has a high chance of being knocked back.
display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG (Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

name: Focused_Shot
display_help: You quickly fire an armor-piercing round from one of your pistols. The target suffers an initial burst of lethal damage and additional lethal damage over time.

name: Dual_Shot
display_help: You fire an armor-piercing round from each of your pistols. The target suffers an initial burst of lethal damage and additional lethal damage over time. The target also suffers reduced defenses and may be knocked down.
display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG (Lethal), Moderate DoT (Lethal), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

name: Barrage
display_help: You fire armor-piercing rounds in a barrage of rapid fire bullets. These strike multiple targets in a cone in front of you, dealing lethal damage and lowering damage resistances. There is also a chance for affected targets to be knocked down.
display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), High DoT (Lethal), -RES (Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

name: Storm_of_Bullets
display_help: You fire numerous bullets at your target so fast that the eye cannot keep up, striking them and all foes around them. This causes a warped bullet trajectory, which causes lethal damage with each hit, as well as an additional chance to knock the target back. The lingering effects of the storm reduce the target's resistances.
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DMG(Lethal), Minor DoT (Lethal), -RES (Foe, All), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

name: Piercing_Rounds
display_help: You take aim and fire a single, powerful armor-piercing round at your target. The target suffers lethal damage, followed by additional lethal damage over time. The bullet rends the target's protections, reducing their defense and resistances.
display_short_help: Ranged (Narrow Cone), High DMG(Lethal), High DoT(Lethal), -DEF (Foe, All), -RES (Foe, All)

name: Debilitating_Shot
display_help: You fire a special armor-piercing round at your opponent that erupts into shrapnel on impact. The target suffers lethal damage as a result of this, along with reduced regeneration, recovery and chance to hit. There is also a chance the target may be stunned.
display_short_help: Ranged, Extreme DMG (Lethal), -Regen (Foe), -Rec (Foe), -ToHit (Foe), Chance to Stun (Foe)

name: Hurricane_Shot
display_help: You fire many rounds in all directions around yourself, striking all nearby targets with your bullets. This causes lethal damage over time to all affected targets. Additionally, targets suffer from reduced resistances against all types of damage.

name: Paralytic_Shot
display_help: You chamber an armor-piercing round at your target that explodes into shrapnel on impact. The force of this round causes paralyzes your opponent, holding them in place while also causing lethal damage. There is a chance that the target will also suffer reduced regeneration and recovery.
display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG (Lethal), Hold (Foe), Chance for -Regen (Foe), -Rec (Foe)

name: Mercurial_Blow
display_help: You strike your foe with a lightning fast blow from your staff dealing Light Smashing damage. The attack is so unexpected that the target's defenses are reduced slightly for a short time. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: Light, Recharge: Fast

name: Precise_Strike
display_help: You attempt to daze your foe with a heavy staff blow to their head. Precise Strike has a higher chance to hit than normal, deals Moderate Smashing damage, and has a small chance to disorient the target briefly. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast.

name: Guarded_Spin
display_help: You spin your staff like a propeller in front of you dealing Light Smashing damage to enemies in your frontal arc and deflecting any incoming attacks, thus boosting your Melee and Lethal damage briefly. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Serpents_Reach
display_help: You fully extend your staff and release a burst of energy to lash out at a distant target and deal Superior Smashing damage with a good chance to knock your target down. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Long

name: Focused_Fighting
display_help: You become more evasive to melee attacks while you have Focused Fighting activated. This will increase your Defense versus melee as long as it is active. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and DeBuffs to Defense. Recharge: Fast

name: Focused_Senses
display_help: You become more evasive against ranged attacks while you have Focused Senses activated. This will increase your Defense versus ranged attacks as long as it is active. Your Improved Senses also allow you to perceive stealthy foes as well as resist Defense DeBuffs. Recharge: Fast

name: Mystic_Shot
display_help: This magic attuned rifle shoots concentrated bursts of magical energy, causing energy damage and reducing your target's defenses.

name: Mystic_Barrage
display_help: You have learned to effectively combine your rifle's rapid fire barrage attack with the magical training of the Carnival. This deals energy damage and reduces your target's defenses.

name: Mystic_Smash
display_help: You retain much of your Resistance armor, even as you learn magic from the Carnival. Your armor's energy punch is now powered by mystic energy, causing energy and smashing damage on impact. There is also a chance that you may stun your target.

name: Mystic_Burst
display_help: Trained by the Carnival mistresses, you have learned how to mimic their Radiance attack, causing energy damage to foes caught in the energy burst and potentially confusing them.

name: Mystic_Suppression
display_help: You have learned to effectively combine your rifle's suppressive burst fire attack with the magical training of the Carnival, allowing for you to suppress the ability of your foes to attack you. This attack causes energy damage. Affected targets also suffer reductions in their chance to hit and both movement and attack speeds.

name: Single_Shot
display_help: You are able to switch off the magical attunement of your rifle at will, allowing you to fire a traditional plasma burst that lowers your target's regeneration.

name: Heavy_Burst
display_help: You switch off the magical attunement of your rifle, allowing you to fire a series of rapid traditional plasma bursts. This causes energy damage to several targets in a cone in front of you and reduces their recovery.

name: Covering_Fire
display_help: You switch off the magical attunement of your rifle, firing a spray of plasma bursts meant to suppress action by your foes. Affected target suffer energy damage and a reduced chance to hit, due to the amount of energy flying around.
